title: About Me
description: Iâ€™m a passionate Full Stack Developer who loves building websites that are both functional and easy to use. I have a solid foundation in ASP.NET Core MVC, ASP.NET Core Web API, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and I enjoy working with frameworks like Bootstrap and Angular to bring ideas to life. In the back-end, I am comfortable with SQL Server and MySQL, crafting solutions that grow with the needs of the project. I am currently in my final year of Software Engineering (with a 3.15 CGPA) and have been sharpening my skills as a Front-end Developer at Xera Marketing. I thrive on learning new things quickly, solving problems and teaming up with others to create something awesome. I am excited to bring my energy and skills to a team that is all about innovation!
